#include<iostream.h>
#include<conio.h>
void main()
{
	int a,b,c;
	clrscr();
	cout<<"Enter First Num: ";
	cin>>a;
	cout<<"Enter Second Num: ";
	cin>>b;
	c=a+b;
	cout<<"Addition: "<<c;
	c=a-b;
	cout<<"Substraction: "<<c;
	c=a*b;
	cout<<"Multiplication: "<<c;
	c=a/b;
	cout<<"Division: "<<c;
	getch();
}
